clearable.description: Whether or not to display a clear button

size.description: Enter the size of the field

placeholder.description_zh: 非范围选择时的占位内容

start-placeholder.description: The placeholder content for the start date when the range is selected
start-placeholder.description_zh: 范围选择时开始日期的占位内容

end-placeholder.description: The placeholder content for the start date when the range is selected
end-placeholder.description_zh: 范围选择时开始日期的占位内容

is-range.description: Whether the time range is selected is valid only for <el-time-picker>you
is-range.description_zh: 是否为时间范围选择，仅对<el-time-picker>有效

arrow-control.description: Whether or not to use arrows for time selection is <el-time-picker>only valid
arrow-control.description_zh: 是否使用箭头进行时间选择，仅对<el-time-picker>有效

:picker-options.description: Refer to the following table for options specific to the current time and date selector
:picker-options.description_zh: 当前时间日期选择器特有的选项参考下表

value-format.description: Optional, only available when TimePicker, bind the format of the value. If not specified, the binding value is a Date object
value-format.description_zh: 可选，仅TimePicker时可用，绑定值的格式。不指定则绑定值为 Date 对象

default-value.value: 可被new Date()解析(TimePicker) / 可选值(TimeSelect)
default-value.description: Optionally, the time displayed by default when the selector is turned on
default-value.description_zh: 可选，选择器打开时默认显示的时间

prefix-icon.description: Customize the class name of the head icon
prefix-icon.description_zh: 自定义头部图标的类名

clear-icon.description: Customize the class name of the clear icon
clear-icon.description_zh: 自定义清空图标的类名

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the user confirms the selected value
events.description_zh: 用户确认选定的值时触发

events.name: blur
events.description_zh: 当 input 失去焦点时触发

events.name: focus
events.description_zh: 当 input 获得焦点时触发
